00001 /**
00002  * @file main.c
00003  * @date 2007-Dez-11

00006  * @brief System main loop for AVR portation.
00007  *
00008  * @note BuildNumber = "BuildNumber : 7951";
00009  *
00010  * @note This file contains the source code for the system main loop
00011  *       that controls the nanoLOC devkit board.
00012  */
00013 #include    "avrport.h"
00014 #include    "led.h"
00015 #ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_POWER_MNGT
00016 #include    "pwrmngt.h"
00017 #endif
00018 #include    "ntrxutil.h"
00019 #include    "nnspi.h"
00020 #include    "phy.h"
00021 #include    <avr/sleep.h>
00022 #include    <avr/wdt.h>
00023 #include    "config.h"
00024 #include    "ntrxtypes.h"
00025 #include    "hwclock.h"
00026 #include    "phy.h"
00027 #include    <stdio.h>
00028 
00029 
00030 #ifdef  CONFIG_CONSOLE
00031 #include    "usart.h"
00032 #endif  /* CONFIG_CONSOLE */
00033 
00034 extern  void    APLInit(void);
00035 extern  void    APLPoll(void);
00036 
00037 #ifdef CONFIG_WATCHDOG
00038 #include    <avr/wdt.h>
00039 #endif
00040 extern PhyPIB phyPIB;
00041 
00042 
00043 
00044 /**
00045  * error_handler:
00046  *
00047  * error_handler() print out the error number and stop the system.
00048  *
00049  * Returns: None
00050  */
00051 void    error_handler(int16_t err)
00052 {
00053 #ifdef  CONFIG_CONSOLE
00054 #ifdef  CONFIG_PRINTF
00055     printf("ErrorHandler: error %d\n", err);
00056     puts("System halted!\n");
00057 #endif  /* CONFIG_PRINTF */
00058 #endif  /* CONFIG_CONSOLE */
00059     LED1 (LED_ON);
00060     LED2 (LED_ON);
00061     LED3 (LED_ON);
00062     LED4 (LED_ON);
00063     LED5 (LED_ON);
00064     LED6 (LED_ON);
00065     LED7 (LED_ON);
00066 
00067     while(1);
00068 }
00069 
00070 
00071 
00072 /**
00073  * main:
00074  *
00075  * The main() function of the PPS
00076  *
00077  * Returns: None.
00078  */
00079 int main(int ac, char *av[])
00080 {
00081     /*
00082      * LEDs are on Port C off avr board
00083      */
00084     LED0_DIR |= LED0_PIN;                       /* Set LED0 port as output */
00085     LED1_DIR |= LED1_PIN;                       /* Set LED1 port as output */
00086     LED2_DIR |= LED2_PIN;                       /* Set LED2 port as output */
00087     LED3_DIR |= LED3_PIN;                       /* Set LED3 port as output */
00088     LED4_DIR |= LED4_PIN;                       /* Set LED4 port as output */
00089     LED5_DIR |= LED5_PIN;                       /* Set LED5 port as output */
00090     LED6_DIR |= LED6_PIN;                       /* Set LED6 port as output */
00091     LED7_DIR |= LED7_PIN;                       /* Set LED7 port as output */
00092 
00093     LED0(LED_OFF);
00094     LED1(LED_OFF);
00095     LED2(LED_OFF);
00096     LED3(LED_OFF);
00097     LED4(LED_OFF);
00098     LED5(LED_OFF);
00099     LED6(LED_OFF);
00100     LED7(LED_OFF);
00101     /*
00102      * Initialize the timer for periodic tasks
00103      * or time supervized actions
00104      */
00105     hwclock_init();
00106 
00107 #   ifdef   CONFIG_CONSOLE
00108     console_init();
00109 #   endif   /* CONFIG_CONSOLE */
00110 
00111 
00112     /*
00113      * Initialize the ntrx driver
00114      */
00115 #   if CONFIG_REG_MAP_NR == 501
00116     NTRXSetDefaultMode ();
00117 #   endif
00118 #   ifndef CONFIG_APP_DKTESTSUITE
00119     if( NTRXInit() == FALSE )
00120     {
00121         error_handler( 506 );
00122     }
00123 #   endif /* CONFIG_APP_DKTESTSUITE */
00124 
00125     /*
00126      * Start the ntrx driver
00127      */
00128 #   if CONFIG_REG_MAP_NR != 501
00129     NTRXStart();
00130 #   endif
00131     /*
00132      * initialize user application
00133      */
00134     APLInit();
00135 
00136     /*
00137      * SYSTEM MAIN LOOP
00138      */
00139     while(1)
00140     {
00141         /*
00142          * call application periodically
00143          */
00144         APLPoll ();
00145         /*
00146          * Check for incomming packets
00147          */
00148 #       ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ
00149         if( nnIrq != 0 )
00150             PHYPoll();
00151 #       ifdef CONFIG_TRAFFIC_LED
00152         UpdateLEDs();
00153 #       endif /* CONFIG_TRAFFIC_LED */
00154 #       ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_AUTO_RECALIB
00155         if( phyPIB.rxState == PHY_RX_ON )
00156             PHYAutoCalibration();
00157 #       endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_AUTO_RECALIB */
00158 #       else
00159         if( phyPIB.pwrDown == FALSE )
00160             PHYPoll ();
00161 #       endif
00162 
00163     }
00164     return  0;
00165 }
